export const IconButton: React.FC<any> = ({ icon, ...props }) => <button className='icon-btn' {...props}>{icon}</button>;

import React from 'react';

export const Checkbox: React.FC<any> = ({ label, ...props }) => <label><input type='checkbox' {...props} /> {label}</label>;

export const truncateAddress = (addr: string) => `${addr.slice(0,6)}...${addr.slice(-4)}`;
export const nanoToStx = (nano: number) => nano / 1000000;

export const simpleEncrypt = (text: string) => btoa(text);
export const simpleDecrypt = (text: string) => atob(text);

export const isValidStxAddress = (addr: string) => addr.startsWith('ST') || addr.startsWith('SP');
export const isStrongPassword = (pass: string) => pass.length > 8;
